name: In re PHILADELPHIA COUNTY TWENTY-SIXTH ADDITIONAL INVESTIGATING GRAND JURY, NOTICE C-1. Petition of Richard Basciano, 2100 West Market Street Corp., 2132 West Market Realty Corp., STB Investments Corp.
name_abbreviation: In re Philadelphia County Twenty-Sixth Additional Investigating Grand Jury

parties: In re PHILADELPHIA COUNTY TWENTY-SIXTH ADDITIONAL INVESTIGATING GRAND JURY, NOTICE C-1. Petition of Richard Basciano, 2100 West Market Street Corp., 2132 West Market Realty Corp., STB Investments Corp.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of September, 2014, the Application for Extraordinary Relief Pursuant to 42 Pa.C.S. § 726 and for a Stay of Proceedings Pending Review is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

Sept. 17, 2014.
